text: Máximo González was the defending champion, but lost to Rubén Ramírez Hidalgo in the first round. Andrej Martin won the title defeating Albert Montañés in the final, 0–6, 6–4, 7–6(8–6), after saving one match point in the tie-break. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==External links== * Main Draw * Qualifying Draw ==References== ATP Challenger 2001 Team Padova - Singles
title: 2015 ATP Challenger 2001 Team Padova – Singles
